aka: Time Loops - A Conversation With Christa Wolf
this_title: Zeitschleifen - Im Dialog mit Christa Wolf
trans_title: Time Loops - A Conversation With Christa Wolf
introduction: The writer Christa Wolf, an individual of central importance in the fields of literature and intellectual history in the GDR, in open conversation with her colleague and friend Daniela Dahn. She provides information about the fissures in her biography, reflects on German history and opens perspectives that allow for reflection on the artist's role in society.
chinese_title: Zeitschleifen - Im Dialog mit Christa Wolf
